ComputeUtility(IZone, IZone)

Compute with the current set of parameters a particular OD pair. This value will be saved and used for the mode split.

| Improve this Doc View Source

EndInterativeModeSplit()

Use this function to kill an already running iterative mode split. This function is not required to be called unless the mode split is never actually executed in order to reclaim memory.

Declaration
void EndInterativeModeSplit()
| Improve this Doc View Source

Initialize the mode choice to go into inter-interactive mode

Parameters

This will be used for updating progress. This will be the total number of distributions for the purpose.
